EmailTemplate.description: Add real value to your services with our special $4.99 offer
EmailTemplate.name: Awareness - Test 3 - Add value with $4.99 offer
EmailTemplate.subject: Add real value to your services with our special $4.99 offer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Create new value-add services using our speical 4.99 offer
View this email in your browser
Add more value to your clients with our $4.991 offer
Adding value is a great way to build client relationships. Proactive advice, efficient service, on-the-spot support all add-value to the services you provide your small business clients. And now you can add even more value using our special $4.991 pricing offer.
We understand one of your small business clients has subscribed to QuickBooks Online and has invited you to help them with their books. But did you know, as a professional accounting advisor, you can get your clients the top-of-the-range QuickBooks Online solution for just $4.991 per month for life1? That’s online quotes and invoices, expenses, bank feeds, payroll2 (for 10 employees) and inventory for just $4.991 for as long as your client uses the software!
Clearly this is a game-changing price – and bundled with the right services, support and/or training it could help you add real value to your existing small business clients as well as attract new ones.
If you’d like to learn more about how QuickBooks Online and this great offer can help you add real value to the services you provide, please attend one of our regular Introduction to QuickBooks Online webinars.
In this free 30 minute webinar, we’ll get you up to speed quickly on:
The benefits of cloud accounting How to get around QuickBooks Online The key features like bank feeds, payroll and more How to provide new value-add services using the special $4.991 offer
Why attend?
By investing a little time now to learn more, you’ll be able to take advantage of this special offer and add real value to the services you offer your small business clients.
Find a date that suits you
If you would prefer to get an overview from a team member now, please call us on 1800 618 521 and we’ll gladly help you out.
Thanks!
QuickBooks Online ProAdvisor Team
1 Offer is valid for accounting and bookkeeping professionals only. Promotional price of $4.99 a month is available until 30 June 2015 and will be guaranteed on QuickBooks Online Plus. This special pricing offer will be terminated upon cancellation. Offer is non transferable, valid only for the individual or company that registers QuickBooks and cannot be combined with any other QuickBooks Online offers. 2 Free payroll services for up to ten employees. Payroll offer expires 31 December 2015. Payroll is offered by a third party application that is fully integrated with QuickBooks Online.
Terms, conditions, features, support, pricing and service options are subject to change without notice.
You're receiving this email because you have provided Intuit your details or have been referred by a colleague.
unsubscribe from this list
